pages.text: The $(mob)Creep$() is a monster that spawns in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players on sight by sneakily approaching them before exploding, similar to a $(l:minecraft_creeper)$(mob)Creeper$(). Additionally, the $(mob)Creep$() is invisible unless within 8 blocks of a player.
$(mob)Creeps$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().
$(mob)Creeps$() can drop a $(item)Creeper Girl Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(l:grimoireofgaia_spawn_creeper_girl)$(mob)Creeper Girl$() helper for the player.
